import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { PrimeNGConfig } from 'primeng/api'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { [x: string]: any; jsonData = ''; selectedFormType: string = 'cuenta'; apiResponse = ''; cuentaForm: FormGroup; transaccionForm: FormGroup; selectedFormType = ''; formTypes = [ { label: 'Cuenta', value: 'cuenta' }, { label: 'Transacción', value: 'transaccion' }, ]; constructor(private primengConfig: PrimeNGConfig) {} ngOnInit() { this.primengConfig.ripple = true; } }
